flixel.tweens.FlxEase

type
class
Static class with useful easer functions that can be used by Tweens.

inline quadIn(t : Float) : Float

Operation of in/out easers: in(t) return t; out(t) return 1 - in(1 - t); inOut(t) return (t <= .5) ? in(t * 2) / 2 : out(t * 2 - 1) / 2 + .5;

inline quadInOut(t : Float) : Float

inline quadOut(t : Float) : Float

inline quintOut(t : Float) : Float
